name: Token Quest: The Zodiac Temple
description:
Take your party of adventurers from the quant little village through the woods and explore the Zodiac Temple!

This was a small project designed to test some roguelike elements in a JRPG style game. There are a few bugs here and there, and some big balancing issues that need to be adjusted.

This game was created for the 30 Day RPG Maker Themed Game Jam. Despite this being a 30 day jam, most of this game was created over the course of two weeks. A lot of it was learning a good workflow for RPG Maker MV, as well as getting the Zodiac Tarot System tweaked.

Credits:
Game Play and Design: Casiodorus
Monster and Token Art: Arcknight
Map: Created using Dungeondraft
Music: Wingless Seraph
Tarot Art: Benebellwen
